summary: An Ordinance amending Section 20, as amended, of Ordinance No. 45382, as adding thereto two sections to be known respectively as Section 2B and Section 17C, said ordinance being entitled: "An Ordinance regulating and restricting the location of trades and industries; regulating and limiting the use of buildings; and premises and the height and size of buildings; providing for yards, courts or other open spaces; establishing districts for the said purposes; defining offenses; prescribing penalties and repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict therewith", approved June 28th, 1923.
